nodes.text: First Battle of the Soul Trees

The First Battle of the Soul Trees was an early confrontation in the Ewok–Dulok War between the Ewoks of Bright Tree Village and the Duloks of the Dulok Swamp. During the battle, an army of Duloks attempted to cut down the Ewoks' Soul Trees with stone axes. The Ewok Erpham Warrick fought back with the Ewok battle wagon, a war machine he had constructed, and forced the invaders back to their swamps.
